item.title: the spoken orgasm pilot SHOW 10
item.description: the spoken orgasm pilot SHOW 10 hosted by SUGA MAMA AND URBAN SKULLISTIC the passion in our bodies leads us back and forth guiding us without end and I we never tire from the lessons as we reach far into an endless journey that takes us beyond the feelings we thought exist I reach out my hand and you catch my every wish spoken Orgasm The new show hosted by SUGA MAMA & URBAN SKULLISTIC dedicated to sMoOve music and the poetry of a love/erotic nature. coming soon like 2 big up all the records and artist we used in this show in no order but all high powered we spinned Rudy Andrew, the might clouds of joy, spanky wilson, ronnie mcneir,gene page,The chosen few, ulnlimited touch,9th creation.side effect leroy hutson,Marvin gaye, Instant funk,babbara jean english... PEACE YALL one LOVE rock on and rock out

item.title: Conspiracy Broadcast Frequency SHOW NINE
item.description:
Conspiracy Broadcast Frequency SHOW NINE
PRE FAB SHOW! very very late in timeing but hey things happend RIP to my (G) mom, Jean Ardella Bragg January 17, 1930 to April 2 2008, I MISS YOU,
ALL RIGHT WE BACK UP IN THIS MUTHA PHUCKA with a very strange show prety much programmed by my partner Rashonda for the A.B.H.T.C movement which is are soul sponsor at the very moment. This show is a surprise......on meant to make us think...
i wanna give MAD love to all the folks involved in this of course Rashona of the (A.B.H.T.C) Jashon and Jamar, Asia and Arron, Seriosly Deep, The counts, Sunset Brown, T MINUS ONE tone ajusters, AKIL THE M.C, Q.B.D.P, THE SOUL CEASARS, Roy Porter, Roy Priester, BINGRIM, MAD BREAK JAMS, AND YOU....you for just being you ONe love yall Urban Skullistic
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/abhtc
http://skullisticbreaks.blogspot.com/
http://www.myspace.com/URBANSKULLISTIC
http://ie.youtube.com/19urban72

item.title: The (RARA) skullistic radio Show 7
item.description:
OK mutha phucka.......im on time and on point LOL SHOW 7 - show seven - in This Piece.....SHOW 5 plus 2 LOL all that........GoOd stuff ok ok ok this should be a stone coLd groOve.....got lil bit all the elements in this show SO sit on back relax ROLL up! CHiLL and vibe with the skullistic fam as we wage Urban warefare on your ear drums... dedicated to My lil Sis out in NORTH philly (Ra) rashonda and her lifes work the (A.B.H.T.C) anti bitch hoe and trick committee, Check her out ON my space, my sister is extremely concerned with the use of words and actions that degrade our women. We hear these words in music, movies, tv shows and out of the mouths of our people all the time. It's time to stop this madness and stand up for our women. It's time to enforce self-love and the truth about these terms to our daughters so that they will NEVER feel the need to call themselves a bitch or accept any disrespect from anyone! Straight up! A message i will be behind as long as i got a heart beat.......
Allright This show we rocked out to lil Vic Ceasar,Placebo,Adam Bello,Carla Thomas,Leroy Hutson,Brother Q.B.D.p from texas,TMINUS one my D.J TONE AJUSTERS, AKIL the M.C,skill district,Sunset Brown,Urban skullistic etc etc...............CHECK OUT URBAN at
http://www.myspace.com/urbanskullistic
better yet Drop on by the Blog and take a look see
http://skullisticbreaks.blogspot.com/

item.title: SmoOve it Out.....Show 6
item.description:
O.K mutha phucka's :) sorry it took, longer than my normal lateness :) one of the tunetables is out of order so we was forced to use other means of getting this show complete, like record and spin in a different lab :( So this show is kinda mellow, which aint a bad thing FILL ME anyway SHOW 6 is filled with FLY breaks and coOl guest Hope yall mutha phuckas enjoy :) love yall peace oh cant forget this show we get into a lil freddie hubbard,master fleet,leo sunship,S.O.UL,new birth, music from SLJ of sa-ra, BinGrim of skullistic production, my baby sis (Rashonda from the A.B.H.T.C) out of philly, and of course yo Boy urban skullistic the host
shout out to TMINUS ONE TONE AJUSTERS,akil the m.c, Agent Malik tone ajusters,skills district,dread daze,chino aka Q,Kenny Crush, UK productions

item.title: L.A SOUND RIOT SHOW 5
item.description: yes yes Yall weeeee Back again, up in this mutha phucka, with SHOW 5 :) LOL SHOW 5......SHOULD BE TOTAL civil unrest up in this B*tCH..... FIRes for miles lit the night, as we Burn this mutha phucka Down....SOUNDS WISE wink wink.......TODAY we get into a NICE jumpoff of fly BReaks and audio warfare By the SKULLISTIC PRODUCTIONS TEAM, Feat cuts from Michel Audiard,Arthur Adams,Los Angeles Negros,Lonnie Liston Smith, The Montereys DJ TMINUS ONE of tone ajusters Rock the Wheels, LOTS OF FAM BAM POP UP TO BLESS US sista Rashonda out of (PHILLY) A.B.H.T.C rock a pretty nice poem about music....great spoken Word, DJ URBAN ,SPINs for a minute Or two,And LOTS and LOTS more....... ROCK ON AND ROCK OUT Thank you......U so Dam CoOL........ THUMBS up...........FONZI style WInk WINk PEACE 2 RASHONDA (A.B.H.T.C) FAM BAM UNIVERSAL SLJ sa-ra, BINGRIM,ADAM BELLO,sunset brown,KENNY CRUSH,akil the M.C, DJ T MINUS ONE,UK productions, WISE 2 nice,SPILL KING,K GLOSS, SKILLS DISTRICT,CHINO,DREAD DAZE, SOUP of jurrassic 5 ETC ETC ONE

item.title: FOCUS.........SHOW 4 skullistic Radio
item.description: hey yall back we again, I know !! Late like a mutha Phucka but, hey he're non the less LOL how the hell are YOu :) i miss yall dearly anyway SHOW4 baby- SHow 4 should be pretty cool, with the help from the emails i gots in regards to bettering the show I think We may have perfected it LOL just playing, it's allways room for inprovement......mental and spiritually LOL COOL well we got some nice sound Warfare going on this evening featuring dee bridgewater, peter herbolzheimer,jose piementa bey,norman feels, melvin bliss music from Q.B.D.P productions,UK productions,skullistic productions,BINGRIM AND URBAN mixing up in the 1's and 2's, and some pretty dam cool local talent hope yall enjoy URBAN AND BINGRIM LARIVERPROJECTS skullistic productions

hey yall back we again, I know !! COOL well we got some nice sound Warfare going on this evening featuring dee bridgewater, peter herbolzheimer,jose piementa bey,norman feels, melvin bliss music from Q.B.D.P productions,UK productions,skullistic productions,BINGRIM AND URBAN mixing up in the 1's and 2's, and some pretty dam cool local talent
hope yall enjoy URBAN AND BINGRIM LARIVERPROJECTS skullistic productions

item.title: the faith in 08 SkullisticBreaks Show 3
item.description: Hey yall, This is Mr.Urban and BINGRIM, Skullisticbreakbeats Show 3, This Should be a pretty Cool Show, Dedicated To (CC) once again BINGRIM, and DJ TiRiq of Tone Ajusters on the One's and Two's, with nice line up of Local talent. guess like UK Productions out of South Caralina,M.C Bones, RASHONA A.B.H.T.C out of Philly, etc etc SICK Sound Doctoring From URBAN, lol some nice breaks and a cool vibe ROCK ON and ROCK OUT be sure if time permit to check us out at http://skullisticbreaks.blogspot.com/ the Mad Rants Of MR.Urban AND BINGRIM
item.dc:creator: IN SIDE THE MIND OF_19urban72
item.itunes:summary:
Hey yall, This is Mr.Urban and BINGRIM, Skullisticbreakbeats Show 3, This Should be a pretty Cool Show, Dedicated To (CC) once again BINGRIM, and DJ TiRiq of Tone Ajusters on the One's and Two's, with nice line up of Local talent. guess like UK Productions out of South Caralina,M.C Bones, RASHONA A.B.H.T.C out of Philly, etc etc SICK Sound Doctoring From URBAN, lol some nice breaks and a cool vibe
ROCK ON and ROCK OUT be sure if time permit to check us out at http://skullisticbreaks.blogspot.com/ the Mad Rants Of MR.Urban AND BINGRIM

item.title: Emergency BROADCAST.....Skullisticbreaks show 2
item.description: hey yall it Mr.urban & BINGRIM again, back for show two, this time i hope the sound is a lil better, we moved the lab from the kitchen to the garage, LOL anyway, this show we kinda got a lil serious with it, with the message we are trying to relay, about the down fall of my beloved art and my people as whole, so to help us out, and bring us back into focus is my dear dear sista, and Friend RASHONDA from the A.B.H.T.C taken, all commerical slot for this evenings SHow,in hope to express that what being pushed by the main steam is not what WE want to hear FILL ME........... anyway (mutha Phucka's) LOL Should be pretty Cool :) we got Some Chocolate MILK coming up this, evening mind is hazy, umm some Black Octopus - eight ways of love, Some Dave Grusin, of course some skullistic break beats and Sound doctoring by urban and BINGRIM, um a URBAN FREE STYLE at the end, LOL due to some technical problems, we all so got a jam producted by my homie out in texas, BROTHA Q.B.D.P doing his dam thang, on the track called, the BOSS it's over LOL we got some SUNSET BROWN and M.C Bones POP n up, to bless the show hell i think that' s it umm OH this show is dedicated to (CC)
item.dc:creator: IN SIDE THE MIND OF_19urban72

item.title: Skullisticbreaks VOL 1 FIRST SHOW
item.description: HEY YALL this mr.urban of skullistic Production, along with BINGRIM as we kick off the first SHOw, Kinda lite hearted just warm you good people up before we hit yall with the Ill breaks, and sick underground LOCAL Stuff southcentral L.A to SouthCaralina Flow, anyway really hope yall enjoy the Show, If time permit hit me with some feed back and advice, thank you one LOve SKULLISTIC BREAKS LA RIVER PROJECTS
